commands.name: az connectedvmware resource-pool create
examples: az connectedvmware resource-pool create --custom-location "custom location name"                --location "location name" --inventory-item "name or id the inventory item"                --name "resource pool name" --resource-group "resource group name"                --vcenter "name or id of the vcenter"

commands.name: az connectedvmware resource-pool delete
examples: az connectedvmware resource-pool delete --ids "resource id" --name "resource pool name"                --resource-group "resource group name" --subscription "Name or ID of subscription"

commands.name: az connectedvmware resource-pool list
commands.summary: Retrieve a list of resource pool of given resource group.
examples: az connectedvmware resource-pool list --resource-group "resource group name"

commands.name: az connectedvmware resource-pool show
commands.summary: Get details of a resource pool by id, resource-group, resource pool name, or subscription.
examples: az connectedvmware resource-pool show --ids "resource id" --name "resource pool name"                --resource-group "resource group name" --subscription "Name or ID of subscription"
